name: SnakeGame (itch) (Maulaf)
description:
Welcome to SnakeGame!

To grow larger, you have to eat the apples attached to the enemy snakes.

You might wonder: What the hell does this have to do with the theme????

Well, you eat the END of the snakes to gain another body part (NEW BEGINNING) ;)

Developers: https://vincn.itch.io/ and me
